item.title: Create a Certificate Signing Request (CSR) with OpenSSL
item.description: I needed to set up HTTPS enabled website in a secured business environment and a part of the process is to submit a Certificate Signing Request (CSR) to Certificate Authority (CA). HTTPS is SSL/TLS layer that secure communication between client and server on top of HTTP. If you’d like to know more about how HTTPS works, Robert Heaton wrote a good article about SSL/TLS over HTTP here. You will need a private key to generate .
